text: Umberto Petrin (born 1960) is an Italian jazz pianist, composer and poet. ==Life and career== Petrin began studying piano in the early 1970s and started playing jazz more than a decade after that. He joined the Italian Instabile Orchestra in 1997.Layne, Joslyn "Artist Biography". AllMusic. Retrieved 28 May 2015.
